verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H7378>Plead<s%> my cause, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them that <S%H3401>strive<s%> with me: fight <S%H3898>against<s%> <S%H853><s%> them that fight <S%H3898>against<s%> me.
Take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H6793>buckler,<s%> and stand <S%H6965>up<s%> for mine <S%H5833>help.<s%>

Draw <S%H7324>out<s%> also the <S%H2595>spear,<s%> and <S%H5462>stop<s%> the way <S%H7125>against<s%> them that <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me: <S%H559>say<s%> unto my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am thy <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

Let them be <S%H954>confounded<s%> and put to <S%H3637>shame<s%> that seek <S%H1245>after<s%> my <S%H5315>soul:<s%> let them be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> and brought to <S%H2659>confusion<s%> that <S%H2803>devise<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>
Let them <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind:<s%> and let the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1760>chase<s%> them.
Let their <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2822>dark<s%> and <S%H2519>slippery:<s%> and let the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7291>persecute<s%> them.

For <S%H3588><s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%> have they <S%H2934>hid<s%> for me their <S%H7568>net<s%> in a <S%H7845>pit,<s%> which without <S%H2600>cause<s%> they have <S%H2658>digged<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Let <S%H7722>destruction<s%> come <S%H935>upon<s%> him at <S%H3808>unawares;<s%> <S%H3045><s%> and let his <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H2934>hid<s%> <S%H3920>catch<s%> himself: into that very <S%H7722>destruction<s%> let him <S%H5307>fall.<s%>
And my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it shall <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is like unto <S%H3644>thee,<s%> which <S%H5337>deliverest<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> from him that is too <S%H4480>strong<s%> <S%H2389><s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> him, yea, the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> from him that <S%H4480>spoileth<s%> <S%H1497><s%> him?
False <S%H2555><s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> did rise <S%H6965>up;<s%> they laid to my <S%H7592>charge<s%> things <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>
They <S%H7999>rewarded<s%> me <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to the <S%H7908>spoiling<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

But as for <S%H589>me,<s%> when they were <S%H2470>sick,<s%> my <S%H3830>clothing<s%> was <S%H8242>sackcloth:<s%> I <S%H6031>humbled<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting;<s%> and my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> mine own <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>

I behaved <S%H1980>myself<s%> as though he had been my <S%H7453>friend<s%> or <S%H251>brother:<s%> I bowed <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H6937>heavily,<s%> as one that <S%H57>mourneth<s%> for his <S%H517>mother.<s%>

But in mine <S%H6761>adversity<s%> they <S%H8055>rejoiced,<s%> and gathered themselves <S%H622>together:<s%> yea, the <S%H5222>abjects<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> it <S%H3808>not;<s%> they did <S%H7167>tear<s%> me, and <S%H1826>ceased<s%> not: <S%H3808><s%>
With <S%H2611>hypocritical<s%> <S%H3934>mockers<s%> in <S%H4580>feasts,<s%> they <S%H2786>gnashed<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me with their <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>

Lord, <S%H136><s%> how <S%H4100>long<s%> wilt thou look <S%H7200>on?<s%> <S%H7725>rescue<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from their <S%H4480>destructions,<s%> <S%H7722><s%> my <S%H3173>darling<s%> from the <S%H4480>lions.<s%> <S%H3715><s%>
I will give thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation:<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> thee among <S%H6099>much<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Let <S%H408>not<s%> them that are mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over me: neither let them <S%H7169>wink<s%> with the <S%H5869>eye<s%> that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me without a <S%H2600>cause.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7965>peace:<s%> but they <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H1697>matters<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them that are <S%H7282>quiet<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
Yea, they <S%H7337>opened<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> wide <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1889>Aha,<s%> <S%H1889>aha,<s%> our <S%H5869>eye<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> it.
This thou hast <S%H7200>seen,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> keep <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2790>silence:<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.
Stir up <S%H5782>thyself,<s%> and <S%H6974>awake<s%> to my <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> even unto my <S%H7379>cause,<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> and my <S%H136>Lord.<s%>
Judge <S%H8199><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> according to thy <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> and let them <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over me.

Let them <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> <S%H1889>Ah,<s%> so would we have <S%H5315>it:<s%> let them <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> We have swallowed him <S%H1104>up.<s%>

Let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and brought to <S%H2659>confusion<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> at mine <S%H7451>hurt:<s%> let them be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%> and <S%H3639>dishonor<s%> that <S%H1431>magnify<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me.

Let them shout for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> that <S%H2655>favor<s%> my righteous <S%H6664>cause:<s%> yea, let them <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> Let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified,<s%> which hath <S%H2655>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
And my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H1897>speak<s%> of thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and of thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
